name: Amit Mehra
description: Leads the corporate advisory wing. Oversees major M&A deals, foreign investments, and legal due diligence for Fortune 500 clients.

name: Priya Nair
description: Heads the IP practice with focus on brand protection and technology patents. Represents startups and creative agencies before IP tribunals.

name: Rohan Sethi
description: Handles complex arbitration cases and commercial suits. Frequently appears before the Delhi High Court and NCLT.

name: Sneha Deshpande
specialization: Employment contracts, HR policies, and POSH compliance
description: Advises corporates on workforce restructuring, employee benefits, and workplace harassment matters.

name: Karan Malhotra
description: Supports partners in preparing case briefs and automating document templates. Skilled in AI-based legal text analytics.

name: Ananya Roy
description: Ensures firm-wide HR compliance, manages recruitment, and oversees Bar Council renewals and continuing legal education programs.

name: Arjun Iyer
description: Manages client invoicing and ensures adherence to billing hours and financial reporting for ongoing legal matters.
